name: Exolon: REDUX
description:
Remake of the 8-bit Cecco classic.

Take control of a futuristic soldier across 5 flick-screen levels of gameplay filled with alien nasties as well as gun emplacements, missiles, landmines and other hazards. Defend yourself with both your gun and rocket-propelled bombs.

Partway through each level is a pod in which you can upgrade to an armoured exoskeleton with improved weapons and armour. Completing a level without this upgrade results in a "bravery bonus".
